licence_overview:
To operate as a bookmakers and take on-course and off-course bets you need a licence from the local magistrates' court. 

If premises are used in taking off-course bets then you will also need an office licence.
licence_short_description: To operate as a bookmakers and take on-course and off-course in Northern Ireland bets you need a licence from the local magistrates' court.
